__e: Hopefully, they will go down this road.
And let's hope they will be the last ones for real.
We hope that's the one mistake they've made.
Let's hope she thinks the same way we do.
However, we have every hope that tomorrow she will be with us once more.
Well, I'm not sure why she's feeding so much, but let's hope she calms a bit.
Let's hope we're not too late.
Let's hope that nothing happened to her.
Let's hope we're not too late.
Let's hope she'll still be lying in the same place tonight.
Let's hope we're not too late.
Let's hope the ones on the surface feel the same way.
We hope you didn’t leave it to the last minute again!
We hope you find all the information you require - if not please don't hesitate to contact us.
Thank you for visiting our site and we hope you've found something that works for you!
I need scarcely say, I think, that I hope this will be a lesson to you.
Let's just hope it's not too good to be true.
Let's hope it's not the last.
And the reason for all this is only one – WE DO OUR JOB like no one else and at the price of the quality. We hope we see you soon.
Well, we're all wishing you the very best and we hope that that happens very soon... for all of us.
We do hope our customers can be here and we can have a happy hour.
Let's hope we can get them before somebody else does. (door chimes jangling) Ladies and gentlemen, you must concentrate for him.
Let's hope we get lucky the first time. What took you so long?
Anyway, let's hope we get a chance to find out.
We hope to see you all back soon, healthy and well.
Thanks for joining us. We hope to see you again some time in the future!
Please stay safe and we hope to see you again very soon!
Do not hesitate to get in touch with us should you have any question. We hope to see you there!
We hope to see you soon and be able to help you in that can.
Thank for your support since 2015. We hope to see you more often in 2017.
Thank for your support since 2015. We hope to see you more often in 2017.
We hope to see you there in large numbers. Thank you for your support and see you soon!
We hope you can find everything you need.
